plurals.name: show_dev_countdown
plurals.item: You are now %1$d steps away from being a developer.
You are now %1$d step away from being a developer.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lowercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d uppercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numerical digits.
Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d special symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 special symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.

plurals.name: manage_notification_access_summary_nonzero
plurals.item: %d apps can read notifications
%d app can read notifications

plurals.name: wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: print_search_result_count_utterance
plurals.item: %1$s printers found
%1$s printer found

plurals.name: phone_in_ecm_notification_time
plurals.item: No data connection for %s minutes
No data connection for %s minute

plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: The phone will be in Emergency Callback mode for %s minutes. While in this mode no applications using a data connection can be used. Do you want to exit now?
The phone will be in Emergency Callback mode for %s minute. While in this mode no apps using a data connection can be used. Do you want to exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: "The selected action isn't available while in the Emergency Callback mode. The phone will be in this mode for %s minutes. Do you want to exit now?"
"The selected action isn't available while in the Emergency Callback mode. The phone will be in this mode for %s minute. Do you want to exit now?"
